Roadmap for 2.0
=================


Hide unnecessary fields from add/edit forms
--------------------------------------------

There are some fields from collectionportlet which are irrelevant
to collectionmultiview.

Dec 10, 2010 - izhar
 * omitted the fields

Renderers which are also collection's browser view
---------------------------------------------------

It is common to have cases where users want collection to
also be displayed like its portlets. Figure out a reuse mechanism here
